name: BowSim
description:
A quick demo I made in Unreal Engine to show the 3D model I made of a compound bow. Includes a small mini-game and a practice range on the other side. Gloves and arms model from: 

“fps arms” (https://skfb.ly/6R6yX) by DJMaesen is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
